ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Dinosaur
ygData.msgSnippet: 500-1k in a night is easy...Rathe Mtns. A high 30s druid/necro pair (or druid/mage) with KEI can easily manage that. 100k might be possible like the other
ygData.messageBody:
500-1k in a night is easy...Rathe Mtns. A high 30s druid/necro pair (or druid/mage) with KEI can easily manage that. 100k might be possible like the other poster mentions, but I can't personally verify that. Then again, back to the 500-1k a night, my hubby's 15 monk could clear about 250 PP an hour if the gobbies in BBM were being generous, and we're talking unbuffed and in Wu's, using ulaks, not ubertwinked.
----- Original Message -----
From: Chirrichela Lomarcan
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Tuesday, March 11, 2003 7:42 AM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Dinosaur

It's kinda funny how many people will claim they can make 100k in one night, but have ya ever noticed they won't say how or where?  Suuuuuuure ya do!
----- Original
On one good evening of exp you can make 100k. (if you are lucky). On one
normal evening of exp you should make at least 500-1kpp if you choose that
type of spot (4h or so of playing).


Visit the EverQuest homepage at http://www.everquest.com
